T02TD1506E:273a-1: sa ha dza tatva a'a lo ka / bod skad du //
T02TD1506E:273a-2: lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba /
T02TD1506E:273a-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1506E:273a-4: kun spyod mngon par 'byung brjod sogs //
T02TD1506E:273a-5: rgyu rnams kun du sbas pa yi //
T02TD1506E:273a-6: zab mo'i de nyid gsang ches pa //
T02TD1506E:273a-7: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs pas bshad //
T02TD1506E:273a-8: brtag dka' rtog ge'i yul min zhing //
T02TD1506E:273a-9: zab mo spros pa nyer zhi ba //
T02TD1506E:273a-10: lkugs pa yi ni rmi lam dang //
T02TD1506E:273a-11: gzhon nus myong ba'i bde ba ltar //
T02TD1506E:273a-12: tshig gis mtshon min rang rig pa //
T02TD1506E:273a-13: ser sna med sogs tshul bzhi yis //
T02TD1506E:273a-14: bla ma nye bar bsten pa yi //
T02TD1506E:273a-15: drin thob shes rab ye shes kyi //
T02TD1506E:273a-16: skad cig gsum par gang skyes pa //
T02TD1506E:273a-17: don mtshungs mtshon pas dper nyid de //
T02TD1506E:273a-18: khyim gnas bu ga'i nam mkha' dang //
T02TD1506E:273a-19: dmus long glang chen yan lag ltar //
T02TD1506E:273a-20: don mthong ma yin 'bras zan gyi //
T02TD1506E:273a-21: spags pa'i bu ram ro bzhin no //
T02TD1506E:273a-22: cha shas dang ni rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1506E:273a-23: sgrib bcas sgrib pa dang bral ba'i //
T02TD1506E:273a-24: dbye ba las ni rnam rmongs pas //
T02TD1506E:273b-0: tshes ma thag dang gang @273b ba yi //
T02TD1506E:273b-1: zla ba sprin gyis bsgribs pa dang //
T02TD1506E:273b-2: gsal ba'i bye brag ma shes so //
T02TD1506E:273b-3: de lta na yang der myong ba //
T02TD1506E:273b-4: bla ma'i gsung gis legs mtshon te //
T02TD1506E:273b-5: rgyud du yang dag goms pa las //
T02TD1506E:273b-6: dang ba'i chu la zla ba dang //
T02TD1506E:273b-7: mig dag pa la gzugs bzhin du //
T02TD1506E:273b-8: gsal bar 'gyur gyi yid ches gyis //
T02TD1506E:273b-9: dngos po sna tshogs snang 'di rnams //
T02TD1506E:273b-10: sems las phyi rol 'gyur med kyang //
T02TD1506E:273b-11: rang rig bag chags dbang byas nas //
T02TD1506E:273b-12: yul dang dbang por snang ba'i sems //
T02TD1506E:273b-13: dbang po'i lam na rjes 'gro bas //
T02TD1506E:273b-14: yul rnams la ni mngon zhugs te //
T02TD1506E:273b-15: chags sogs nyon mongs rgyur gyur pa //
T02TD1506E:273b-16: las kyi shing rta'i 'khor lo ltar //
T02TD1506E:273b-17: yun ring srid par yang dang yang //
T02TD1506E:273b-18: sdug bsngal dang bcas rnam par 'khor //
T02TD1506E:273b-19: nang du yang dag 'jog pa yi //
T02TD1506E:273b-20: thabs kyis de las rnam bzlog nas //
T02TD1506E:273b-21: rlung bral mar me lta bu yi //
T02TD1506E:273b-22: rnal 'byor rgyun du goms byas nas //
T02TD1506E:273b-23: ma rnyog lteng ka'i chu bzhin du //
T02TD1506E:273b-24: rang gi de nyid gsal mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1506E:273b-25: shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma //
T02TD1506E:273b-26: gzugs bzang lang tsho phun tshogs pa //
T02TD1506E:273b-27: khro med rjes su brtse ba dang //
T02TD1506E:273b-28: dad dang thos sogs yon tan can //
T02TD1506E:273b-29: sgrub las gzhan du mi blta zhing //
T02TD1506E:273b-30: skal bzang byed pa 'ching ba yi //
T02TD1506E:273b-31: sbyor ba la ni rab goms pa //
T02TD1506E:273b-32: mi mo dngos grub sa gzhi yin //
T02TD1506E:273b-33: de dang lhan cig dben par gnas //
T02TD1506E:273b-34: stobs bzang myos byed bcas bza' zhing //
T02TD1506E:273b-35: blta ba dang ni rig pa dang //
T02TD1506E:273b-36: 'khyud dang ma mchu'i ro myangs pas //
T02TD1506E:273b-37: rjes su chags par 'gyur ba ni //
T02TD1506E:273b-38: mtshan ma'i dbye bas gsal rtogs bya //
T02TD1506E:273b-39: chags pa chen pos rab rgyas rtsa ;
T02TD1506E:273b-40: /'tshir dang zlos pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1506E:273b-41: mngon sum lce yi thur mas drangs //
T02TD1506E:273b-42: nor bu'i nang du legs chud pas //
T02TD1506E:273b-43: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
T02TD1506E:273b-44: gsal bar nges kyis gzhan du min //
T02TD1506E:273b-45: de nyid du ni ye shes mchog / sdom bya thun nam nyin gcig gam //
T02TD1506E:273b-46: zla phyed zla gcig khyud kor dang ;
T02TD1506E:273b-47: / bskal pa bskal pa stong dag tu //
T02TD1506E:273b-48: de goms pa las mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1506E:273b-50: der ni legs 'du'i dam tshig rdzas //
T02TD1506E:273b-51: rlung gi stobs kyis thob pa'am //
T02TD1506E:273b-52: dman pa'i sems kyis dor min pas //
T02TD1506E:273b-53: phyi rol nas ni lces blang bya //
T02TD1506E:274a-2: sems kyi zab mo'i de kho na //
T02TD1506E:274a-4: gnyug ma'i lam gyi bgrod grub shog / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba slob dpon ku sa li pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
